name: slug
desc: Buat string 'slug' yang ramah URL dari teks.
author: Termz
command:
import re
try:
    text = input('Teks judul: ')
    text = text.lower().strip()
    text = re.sub(r'[^a-z0-9\s-]', '', text)
    text = re.sub(r'[\s_]+', '-', text)
    text = re.sub(r'-+', '-', text)
    print(f'Slug: {text}')
except Exception as e:
    print(f'Error: {e}')
